channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Climate Tech Startup With Celebrity And Billionaire Backers Files For Bankruptcy
item.description: The company, which grew out of fintech Aspiration, owes $30 million to billionaire Steve Ballmer’s L.A. Clippers. It reported a $580 million accumulat...

item.title: Microsoft Teams Users Exploited In Sophisticated Multi-Stage AI Attack
item.description: Threat actors are getting more creative to trick users into multi-stage hack attacks. As this exploit targeting Microsoft Teams users demonstrates.

item.title: Picture This: Big Changes With ChatGPT’s Image Release
item.description: I listened to an AI Daily Brief about ChatGPT’s new image capabilities, based on an X post by Balaji Srinivasan.

item.title: Zack Snyder’s New UFC Movie ‘Brawler’ Could Have A Star-Studded Cast
item.description: Zack Snyder is teaming up with the UFC and Saudi officials to direct Brawler, a fictional film about chasing a UFC dream—with real MMA figures possibl...

item.title: Apple Intelligence Comes To Vision Pro With VisionOS 2.4
item.description: The VisionOS 2.4 update adds a stack of Apple Intelligence features to the Vision Pro headset, including Genmoji, Writing Tools and Image Playground.

item.title: Credulous
item.description: Where do con men come from? There are three conditions that need to be met: First, there needs to be rising societal pressure to get ahead, cut the li...

item.title: Division is easier than connection
item.description: But connection is where the value lies. Connected, resilient communities create possibility and forward motion. Division is satisfying in the short ru...

item.title: “Be yourself”
item.description: Really? Which self? The self you were when you were two years old, almost out of diapers? The self you were when you were screaming with the fans at t...

item.title: Toward leggiero
item.description: We might not seek it out often enough in our work. It’s a musical term, but we can use it too. The light touch. A way to make a sound without making a...

item.title: Obvious vs perhaps
item.description: “Obvious” closes the door to inquiry. “Perhaps” opens it.
